1.1.2.name: wordpress/simple-gmail-login
1.1.2.description:
Once you have installed this plugin you can login to wp-admin using your ordinary user name (or your email) and your password on GMail (your old wordpress password still works as well).

Additional features

  • You'll get a log of all login activity in wp-admin
  • Add an HTML-snippet that will be added below the login form
